verses.verse: Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went on <S%H5375><s%> his journey, <S%H7272><s%> and came <S%H3212><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east. <S%H6924><s%>

He looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H875><s%> a well in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and, <S%H7969><s%> behold, three flocks <S%H5739><s%> of sheep <S%H6629><s%> lying <S%H7257><s%> there by it. <S%H875><s%> For out of that well they watered <S%H8248><s%> the flocks. <S%H5739><s%> The stone <S%H68><s%> on the well <S%H875><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%> was large. <S%H1419><s%>

There all the flocks <S%H5739><s%> were gathered. <S%H622><s%> They rolled <S%H1556><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the well <S%H875><s%>'s mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and watered <S%H8248><s%> the sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and put <S%H7725><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> on the well <S%H875><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%> in its place. <S%H4725><s%>
Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H251><s%> "My relatives, where <S%H370><s%> are you from? <S%H559><s%>" They said, "We are from Haran. <S%H2771><s%>"
He said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H3045><s%> "Do you know Laban, <S%H3837><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nahor? <S%H5152><s%>" They said, <S%H559><s%> "We know him. <S%H3045><s%>"

He said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H7965><s%> "Is it well with him? <S%H559><s%>" They said, "It is well. <S%H7965><s%> See, <S%H7354><s%> Rachel, his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> is coming <S%H935><s%> with the sheep. <S%H6629><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2005><s%> it is still the middle <S%H1419><s%> of the day, <S%H3117><s%> not time <S%H6256><s%> to gather the livestock <S%H4735><s%> together. <S%H622><s%> Water <S%H8248><s%> the sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and go <S%H3212><s%> and feed them. <S%H7462><s%>"

They said, <S%H559><s%> "We can <S%H3201><s%>'t, until all the flocks <S%H5739><s%> are gathered together, <S%H622><s%> and they roll <S%H1556><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the well <S%H875><s%>'s mouth. <S%H6310><s%> Then we water <S%H8248><s%> the sheep. <S%H6629><s%>"
While he was yet <S%H5750><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> with them, <S%H7354><s%> Rachel came <S%H935><s%> with her father <S%H1><s%>'s sheep, <S%H6629><s%> for she kept them. <S%H7462><s%>

It happened, <S%H3290><s%> when Jacob saw <S%H7200><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Laban, <S%H3837><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>'s brother, <S%H251><s%> and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of Laban, <S%H3837><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>'s brother, <S%H251><s%> that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went near, <S%H5066><s%> and rolled <S%H1556><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the well <S%H875><s%>'s mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and watered <S%H8248><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>'s brother. <S%H251><s%>
Jacob <S%H3290><s%> kissed <S%H5401><s%> Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and wept. <S%H1058><s%>

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> that he was her father <S%H1><s%>'s brother, <S%H251><s%> and that he was Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>'s son. <S%H1121><s%> She ran <S%H7323><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> her father. <S%H1><s%>

It happened, <S%H3837><s%> when Laban heard <S%H8085><s%> the news of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> his sister <S%H269><s%>'s son, <S%H1121><s%> that he ran <S%H7323><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and embraced <S%H2263><s%> him, <S%H5401><s%> and kissed him, <S%H935><s%> and brought him to his house. <S%H1004><s%> Jacob told <S%H5608><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> all these things. <S%H1697><s%>
Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H389><s%> "Surely you are my bone <S%H6106><s%> and my flesh. <S%H1320><s%>" He lived <S%H3427><s%> with him for <S%H3117><s%> a month. <S%H2320><s%>

Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "Because you are my brother, <S%H251><s%> should you therefore serve <S%H5647><s%> me for nothing? <S%H2600><s%> Tell <S%H5046><s%> me, <S%H4909><s%> what will your wages be?"

Laban <S%H3837><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> daughters. <S%H1323><s%> The name <S%H8034><s%> of the elder <S%H1419><s%> was Leah, <S%H3812><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the younger <S%H6996><s%> was Rachel. <S%H7354><s%>
Leah <S%H3812><s%>'s eyes <S%H5869><s%> were weak, <S%H7390><s%> but Rachel <S%H7354><s%> was beautiful <S%H3303><s%> in form <S%H3303><s%> and attractive. <S%H4758><s%>

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> Rachel. <S%H7354><s%> He said, <S%H559><s%> "I will serve <S%H5647><s%> you seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> your younger <S%H6996><s%> daughter. <S%H1323><s%>"

Laban <S%H3837><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "It is better <S%H2896><s%> that I give <S%H5414><s%> her to you, <S%H5414><s%> than that I should give her to another <S%H312><s%> man. <S%H376><s%> Stay with me. <S%H3427><s%>"

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for Rachel. <S%H7354><s%> They seemed <S%H5869><s%> to him but a few <S%H259><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> for the love he had for her. <S%H160><s%>

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> "Give <S%H3051><s%> me my wife, <S%H802><s%> for my days <S%H3117><s%> are fulfilled, <S%H4390><s%> that I may go in to her. <S%H935><s%>"
Laban <S%H3837><s%> gathered together <S%H622><s%> all the men <S%H582><s%> of the place, <S%H4725><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> a feast. <S%H4960><s%>
It happened in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> that he took <S%H3947><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> her to him. <S%H935><s%> He went in to her.
Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> his handmaid <S%H8198><s%> to his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> for a handmaid. <S%H8198><s%>

It happened in the morning <S%H1242><s%> that, <S%H3812><s%> behold, it was Leah. He said <S%H559><s%> to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> "What is this you have done <S%H6213><s%> to me? <S%H5647><s%> Didn't I serve with you for Rachel? <S%H7354><s%> Why then have you deceived me? <S%H7411><s%>"
Laban <S%H3837><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "It is not done <S%H6213><s%> so in our place, <S%H4725><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the younger <S%H6810><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the firstborn. <S%H1067><s%>

Fulfill <S%H4390><s%> the week <S%H7620><s%> of this one, <S%H2063><s%> and we will give <S%H5414><s%> you the other also for the service <S%H5656><s%> which you will serve <S%H5647><s%> with me yet seven <S%H7651><s%> other <S%H312><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>"
Jacob <S%H3290><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H4390><s%> and fulfilled her week. <S%H7620><s%> He gave <S%H5414><s%> him Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> as wife. <S%H802><s%>
Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> his handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> to be her handmaid. <S%H8198><s%>

He went in <S%H935><s%> also to Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and he loved <S%H157><s%> also Rachel <S%H7354><s%> more than Leah, <S%H3812><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> with him yet seven <S%H7651><s%> other <S%H312><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Leah <S%H3812><s%> was hated, <S%H8130><s%> and he opened <S%H6605><s%> her womb, <S%H7358><s%> but Rachel <S%H7354><s%> was barren. <S%H6135><s%>

Leah <S%H3812><s%> conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and she named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Reuben. <S%H7205><s%> For <S%H3588><s%> she said, <S%H559><s%> "Because <S%H3588><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has looked <S%H7200><s%> at my affliction. <S%H6040><s%> For <S%H3588><s%> now my husband <S%H376><s%> will love me. <S%H157><s%>"

She conceived <S%H2029><s%> again, <S%H3205><s%> and bore a son, <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> that I am hated, <S%H8130><s%> he has therefore given <S%H5414><s%> me this son also. <S%H8034><s%>" She named him <S%H7121><s%> Simeon. <S%H8095><s%>

She conceived again, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%> Said, <S%H559><s%> "Now this time <S%H6471><s%> will my husband <S%H376><s%> be joined <S%H3867><s%> to me, <S%H3205><s%> because I have borne him three <S%H7969><s%> sons. <S%H1121><s%>" Therefore was his name <S%H8034><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Levi. <S%H3878><s%>

She conceived <S%H2029><s%> again, <S%H3205><s%> and bore a son. <S%H1121><s%> She said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H6471><s%> time will I praise <S%H3034><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>" Therefore she named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Judah. <S%H3063><s%> Then she stopped <S%H5975><s%> bearing. <S%H3205><s%>
